dc_title_s: Title: A map of Hindoostan, or the Mogul Empire : (Sheet 1)
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:3,000,000 (E 65째--E 100째/N 33째-N 6째). Relief shown pictorially."The map engraved by I. Phillips & W. Harrison - The writing by T. Harmar." Prime meridian: [London]."Sold by W. Faden Geographer to his Majesty and to His Royal Highness the Prince of Wales, No. 5, Charing Cross."|104 x 121 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:3,000,000|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
